name: The Lloyd V. Club
description:
"Lloyd Flecher? Don't mess with this guy. He will show you fear in a handful of frames."

_Synopsis

This is Halloween.

Mommy wants to watch a movie to celebrate. Mommy likes monsters. Be a good boy/girl : go to the local video store and get her one.

Some say the manager, Mr. Lloyd, offers candies to good boys/girls.

But don't forget your sword, valiant knight. The dead walks tonight.

_Tricks

  • Use the direction keys to move around (⇀, ↼, ↾, ⇃).
  • Talk to strangers. Lots, and lots of little stories.
  • Explore dark corners. Look closely. It's riddled with easter eggs (more than 70).
  • Watch weird movies. The Lloyd is filled with good one.
  • Fight Monsters. The worst kinds.
  • But don't be afraid. Trapped in the dark, light your heart.
  • Underaged? Try, but be careful. Some content is sensitive and may be considered offensive.

Amusez-vous bien.
